scripts.dev: npm run mongo; npm run rabbit; npm run start
scripts.docker-run-view: docker run -p 8080:8080 --network host gabrielgene/insta-js yarn start
scripts.docker-run-cron: docker run --network host gabrielgene/insta-js yarn cron
scripts.docker-run-worker: docker run --network host gabrielgene/insta-js yarn worker
